title: Transition
description: A schema representing a sensory event transition from the 1st to the 2nd sensory event

sensorType.description: The sensor that that this transition belongs to

sensorLocation.description: The location this sensor resides on

timestamp.description: The time this transition was logged

firstSensorEventKey.description: The first sensor event of the transition

predictedSensorEventKey.description: The predicted sensor event in this transition
